sn36.25:1.1: “‘Ima vedana’ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapadi, nanam udapadi, panna udapadi, vijja udapadi, aloko udapadi.
sn36.25:1.2: ‘Ayam vedanasamudayo’ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapadi …pe… aloko udapadi.
sn36.25:1.3: ‘Ayam vedanasamudayagamini patipada’ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapadi …pe…
sn36.25:1.4: ‘ayam vedananirodho’ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapadi …pe…
sn36.25:1.5: ‘ayam vedananirodhagamini patipada’ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapadi …pe…
sn36.25:1.6: ‘ayam vedanaya assado’ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu …pe…
sn36.25:1.7: ‘ayam vedanaya adinavo’ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu …pe…
sn36.25:1.8: ‘idam kho nissaranan’ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhum udapadi, nanam udapadi, panna udapadi, vijja udapadi, aloko udapadi”ti.
